OOC: yay! I have a snow day today. With over a foot of snow falling
yesterday, all the schools shut down. Now I get to RP all day.

::Demolition::

He saw Angel Prime take off.
"No ya dont!"
He flyes after him, shooting gattaling guns. 
He gets a perfect line up, and shoots a missile at Angel Prime and
Teltoli.

::Hot Rod::

He jumped at the transmission as Kluster did.
"Lets move!"
He runs out of the base, and transformes to sports car mode. He heads
for the battle.

::DrillBit::

He obsearved bots working, and running around. It was a cool feeling,
knowing that he was at least 1/2 of the command team.

::Dollen::

He still waited silently for StarScream to transform to plane mode.
Then they could catch up with Killfest's group.
